headSection.personalDescription: My goal is to build engaging interfaces using modern technologies, while keeping the code clean, efficient, and scalable.

header.description: Hi! I'm Damián, currently a front-end developer. Over 2 years of experience.

frontend.title: Front-end
frontend.items: TypeScript, React, Next.js, React Native, Expo, Redux Toolkit

tools.title: Tools
tools.items: Motion, TanStack Query, React Toastify, React Hook Form, next-intl, i18next, Embla Carousel, Recharts, zod

aboutMeSection.favoritesTools: Some of my favorite technologies and tools I've worked with.

vanicracia.title: Vanicracia
vanicracia.description: E-commerce focused on astrology, featuring various sections including services, courses, and products. It allows users to explore and purchase items, view their details, and access pre-recorded courses. It also includes a shopping cart with integrated payment systems and a user authentication system that supports login, registration, and password recovery.
vanicracia.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, React Hook Form, React Toastify, Motion, Redux Toolkit, TanStack Query, zod

alfombrasTauro.title: Alfombras Tauro
alfombrasTauro.description: A website specialized in rugs, offering a wide range of products, accessories, and services. It allows users to explore each category, access their respective items, and view detailed information about each one.
alfombrasTauro.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, React Hook Form, Motion, TanStack Query, zod

dondeSalgo.title: Dónde Salgo
dondeSalgo.description: Mobile application for Android and iOS, focused on the search for parties and other places around Buenos Aires. It features several sections and an intuitive user flow. In addition, it includes a complete authentication system, an admin panel, among many other features.
dondeSalgo.technologies: React Native, Expo, TypeScript, React Hook Form, TanStack Query, Redux Toolkit, React Native Reanimated, i18next, zod

spotifyMobile.title: Spotify Mobile
spotifyMobile.description: A clone of the Spotify mobile app using React Native and Expo. It features a variety of sections and playlists with their respective songs, as well as a functional floating player and its corresponding screen.
spotifyMobile.technologies: React Native, Expo, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, React Native Reanimated
